title: Fix README and CHANGES for Solr 5.0
description:
As Erik pointed out on the 5.0 RC1 Vote thread, we need to fix the solr CHANGES.txt to not talk about servlet container.
We shouldn't be mentioning about that and fix the README pointing to paths that were deleted for 5.0 (example/solr).

comments.author: Uwe Schindler
comments.content:
I alos found another small thing (existent very long) in the analyzers/common module' README.txt file:


Lucene Contrib Analyzers README file



It still mentions "contrib" there. This is like that since 4.0, but if we fix docs, we should fix this one too.
